TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Bilus, title = Bilus, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bilus} }

S.FORM: alang Bilus ga niya mki sku Toweng si atu Hosing Ku, kwara sali buwan nya ga 19 buwan, 33 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 82% kyan ku 27 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 18% kyan ku 6 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Tayan 76%, Amis 3%, binah lihuyan s'uli 3%. maki qu ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Bilus hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay 'zil na Bilus hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkyahu' na Bilus hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkraya' na Bilus hya' ga llyung. tay mkyahu' na Bilus hya' ga Silong. tay 'llaw na Bilus hya' ga Snazi. rekisi kayal kyokay ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Bilos ga niya mki sko Toweng si ato Hosing Ko, kwara sali bowan nya ga 19 bowan, 33 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 82% kyan ko 27 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 18% kyan ko 6 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Tayan 76%, Amis 3%, binah lihoyan s'oli 3%. maki qo ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Bilos hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay 'zil na Bilos hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay mkyaho' na Bilos hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay mkraya' na Bilos hya' ga llyong. tay mkyaho' na Bilos hya' ga Silong. tay 'llaw na Bilos hya' ga Snazi. rekisi kayal kyokay ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
